mdq:check.name: Resource Distribution Contact Identifier
mdq:check.description: Check that a distribution contact identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global distributionContactIdentifier
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A distribution contact identifier is not present if 'distributionContactIdentifier' not in globals() or distributionContactIdentifier is None or len(distributionContactIdentifier) == 0: output = "No distribution contact identifier was found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(distributionContactIdentifier)): output = "The distribution contact identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: distributionContactIdentifier = mvar.toUnicode(distributionContactIdentifier) # Check if distribution contact identifier type is a single string or list if(isinstance(distributionContactIdentifier, str)): output = "The distribution contact identifier '{}' was found".format(distributionContactIdentifier) else: output = "The distribution contact identifier '{}' was found (first of {} identifiers)".format(distributionContactIdentifier[0].strip(), len(distributionContactIdentifier))
status = "SUCCESS" return True
